entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:05 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:05 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
